mapper.insert: insert into member(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_JUMIN, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_HP, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_ZIPCODE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_ADDR2) values(#{memberId},#{memberName},#{memberPwd},#{memberJumin},#{memberEmail}, #{memberHp},#{memberGender},#{memberZipcode},#{memberAddr},#{memberAddr2})
mapper.select: select MEMBER_PWD from member where MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} and MEMBER_OUTDATE is null
select count(*) from member where MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
select count(*) from member where member_jumin=#{memberJumin}
mapper.update: update member set member_outdate=sysdate where member_id=#{memberId} and member_outdate is null
mapper.select: select member_pwd from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_email=#{memberEmail}
mapper.update: update member set member_pwd =#{memberPwd} where member_id=#{memberId}
